document.full_text: amr corp's american airlines must reinstate its fares and flight schedule on orbitz.com after it pulled content in december during a spat over how orbitz worldwide publishes the carrier's fares, an illinois court said on wednesday.
document.title: court tells american to put airfares back on orbitz
lines_and_colors: amr corp's american airlines must reinstate its fares and flight schedule on orbitz.com after it pulled content in december during a spat over how orbitz worldwide publishes the carrier's fares, an illinois court said on wednesday.
